Attacks.Name: Giant Water Shuriken
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, apply the Bleed special condition to the target character and any character within range 1 of the target.

Attacks.Name: Dark Pulse
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals damage to all characters within range 2 of the target character. If a wild is rolled, also apply the Staggered special condition to those characters.

Attacks.Name: Cutthroat Hydro Pump
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals piercing damage, ignoring part of the target's defense. If a wild is rolled, the target character is pushed away L distance from Ash-Greninja.

Superpowers.Name: Battle Bond
Superpowers.Effect: When this superpower is activated, Ash-Greninja gains +1 to all attack rolls and defense rolls for the rest of the game. This superpower can be used only once per game.

Superpowers.Name: Ninja Agility
Superpowers.Effect: Add 2 dice to Ash-Greninja's defense rolls when attacked from any range. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Attacks.Name: Aerial Ace
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Ash-Greninja may make an immediate move action.

Superpowers.Name: Water Veil
Superpowers.Effect: Remove all special conditions from Ash-Greninja and gain 2 power. This superpower can be used only once per turn.
